reviews.title: Ultimate Buddhism Library
reviews.comment: I actually went to my online banking thinking that an app. like this had to have a misprint in price. The receipt didnt show the price. Nope. Its just a great app. for an even better price.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Alot of content for a small price.
reviews.comment: So far I am very happy with this app. It has alot of great content. Although some is a little strange ie: The Smokey the bear sutra???
reviews.author: Matt Biczel

reviews.comment: Wow! What a great find! Crashed the first time I tried to open it. After that it\'s been awesome. Definitely worthh the money!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Looked a great app
reviews.comment: unfortunately at 40+ mb with no option to move to SD its a memory hog ..sony xperia(rooted)...reluctantly uninstalled this otherwise good app,tho Access to Insight app is better.Developer does not respond to mail either.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is such a wonderful collection. I am so glad that I found the settings to make it fit the screen!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uninstall..
reviews.comment: Sorry but this needs app2sd. Far too much memory used
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The script would only align to the furthest left side of the screen, cutting the page in half
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Would gladly buy again if it doesn\'t keep force closing. Never opened.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Never got it to work; it just keeps freezing. Shame, looks like a nice collection.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app I am new to Buddhism and found this really helpful
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Interesting enough selection of old translations. But all accented characters disappear in text, which is a real problem.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Don\'t fit for my HTC EVO 3D screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I paid for it but it won\'t let me download it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ics support please!
reviews.comment: HTC rezound w/ ics. Can\'t download until then. :(
reviews.author: A Google User
